title: Akali is overpowered, and no one can tell me otherwise
body:
Akali, an assassin, has insane lifesteal and sustain (few red flags up already), huge damage (even for an assassin), stupidly short cooldowns (c'mon, q's cooldown is not even fair), true invis (lets get a yay for free tower dives), and one of, if not the best, engages/disengages in league. Not to mention its not the easiest champion to disengage from, or even kill for that matter. Also, {{item:1082}} straight broken on her, and yes, even compared to other assassins.

Please stop letting CertainlyT design/rework champs, thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Doge2020,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TbVg6ni8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-10T23:08:02.769+0000)

And btw the early damage of q is actually laughable, it has such low damage early that getting hit by it is more annoying than actually something to fear.

It's unfair to simply state the energy cost of the ability without stating the many parts of it that make the energy cost less important. For a start, her Q is her only energy cost other than her 10 cost E, making it immediately less impressive.

It's also very noteworthy that her Q would be a fairly powerful ability even if it was on an 8-second cooldown, and you can't simply replace that with an energy cost which takes 8 seconds to get back. Doing so isn't accounting for all the extra energy you get from her passive, the energy regeneration on her W and the quick regeneration of energy to top that, especially when she can stealth for so long in her W to get back energy. An Akali can definitely spam her Q a lot more than the "high energy cost" argument would make you believe.
Q->auto in repetition in the laning phase is what makes the low cooldown kinda lame.

Frustrating? Might be.
Strong niche spells? Probably.
OP? Absolutly not.
OK, so maybe op is a bit of an overstatement, but "strong niche spells" isn't what we needed with her rework {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

the only thing I find overpowered about akali is her lvl 1-2, I don't think it should be stronger then every champion in the game's lvl 1/2 because of q cd.
